name: Sadler Consultants Europe GmbH
goal:
Sadler Consultants support clean air and transport, particularly in the field of Urban Access Regulations and Low Emission Zones. Support public authorities on access regulations.
We run an EU-wide Urban Access Regulation Scheme Platform and website, supported by DG MOVE (not financially), with public authority members and information for the public on urban access regulations. http://urbanaccessregulations.eu/
euInitiatives: Air Quality, Transport, Emissions, Transport White Paper, Clean Vehicles, activities of DG MOVE "Clean Transport Urban Transport" unit.
customers: Cities of London Antwerp Rotterdam and Brussels
